title: The Fan
creator_credit: Edward Bianchi, Robert Stigwood and Paramount Pictures
brief_description: A suspenseful thriller starring Lauren Bacall as the glamorous Broadway actress, Sally Ross. Sally has many adoring fans but amusement turns into terror when she becomes the obsession of one young man who is prepared to go to any lengths to realise his ultimate fantasy. Cast also includes James Garner, Maureen Stapleton, Hector Elizondo and Michael Biehn as “the fan”. Based upon the novel by Bob Randall.
